name: Byte Defender
description:
Description:

 Fight enemies as a virtual snake that tries to protect your computer from unwanted viruses in an action, old arcade-style game. Get as high a score as you can by finishing the round and killing lots of enemies.

Movement:

Use your mouse to control the direction the player moves.

Left Mouse Button to dash attack.

ESC, R, Middle Mouse Button - restart.

In case you get stuck:

 Beware that sometimes you can get stuck because one of the enemies escaped into the void. Just restart the game by pressing escape.

Attribution:

Music - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/defrini/single/biogas/

New round sound effect - https://freesound.org/s/270333/

 Hope you will enjoy the game.
